message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $15,000. I believe it will be incredibly valuable to you, even more so than that asking price.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the value. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000? I'm confident you'll see a significant return on this investment.
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to meet you at $11,500. Can you consider that?
